alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 27 at 2:58AM AKST until November 30 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From Monday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold air, an upper level disturbance, and strong winds in the upper atmosphere will combine and allow for high winds to potentially develop Monday evening and continue through Tuesday night.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
